meanings.definition: A decorative fastening for the cuffs of a shirt, typically consisting of a pair of linked buttons or a button and a chain.
meanings.sent1: He wore shiny cufflinks to the party.
meanings.sent2: She admired the elegant cufflinks on his shirt.
meanings.sent3: The cufflinks sparkled like tiny stars on his sleeves.
meanings.sent4: His cufflinks were like miniature pieces of art.
meanings.sent5: The cufflinks added a touch of sophistication to his outfit.
